category: Catastrophic effects (i.e. death) on cultured species
ability to access facility (days per year)
availability of terrestrial ingredients for fish feeds
location of shore based processing facilities, docks, distribution centers
range of non-target species which impact aquaculture such as marine mammals, predators, protected species etc.
terrestrial crop production and impact on demand for aquaculture as food source
the amount or toxicity of pollutants released into water/air.
availability of natural feed for filter feeders (phytoplankton)
availability of ocean based feed ingredients (fish meal, fish oil)
distribution of broodstock and spawner timing
nutrient availability for seaweed (N, P, K)
sublethal effects other than growth or disease susceptibility
